org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch
Class AsynchMessageRoute

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.camel.builder.BuilderSupport
      org.apache.camel.builder.RouteBuilder
          org.apache.camel.spring.SpringRouteBuilder
              org.cleverbus.api.route.AbstractBasicRoute
                  org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.AsynchMessageRoute
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.camel.RoutesBuilder, Aware, ApplicationContextAware
@CamelConfiguration(value="msgRouteBean")
public class AsynchMessageRoute
extends AbstractBasicRoute

Route definition that processes asynchronous message taken from message queue.

Some "well-known" URIs:

  • AsynchConstants.URI_ERROR_FATAL
  • AsynchConstants.URI_ASYNC_MSG
  • AsynchConstants.URI_ERROR_HANDLING

Author:
Petr Juza

Method Detail

doConfigure

protected void doConfigure()
                    throws Exception
Route for processing messages from the queue.

Prerequisite: Message in the body in the state MsgStateEnum.PROCESSING

Output: correctly processed message

Specified by:
doConfigure in class AbstractBasicRoute
Throws:
Exception - can be thrown during configuration

public void setLogContextParams(@Body
                                        Message message,
                                        @Header(value="REQUEST_ID")@Nullable
                                        String requestId)
Set log context parameters.

Parameters:
message - the message
requestId - the request ID
See Also:
LogContextHelper.setLogContextParams(Message, String)

isMessageObsolete

@Handler
public boolean isMessageObsolete(@Body
                                         Message msg)
Checks if current message wasn't converted to other state or is being processed more times. It can happen when message is long time in queue that repairing process converts message back to PARTLY_FAILED state and evenly message can start with duplicate processing.

Parameters:
msg - the message
Returns:
true when message is obsolete otherwise false

logStartProcessing

@Handler
public void logStartProcessing(@Body
                                       Message msg,
                                       @Nullable@Header(value="insertMsgToQueue")
                                       Long msgInsertTime)

setEntityInfo

@Handler
public void setEntityInfo(@Body
                                  Message msg,
                                  @Headers
                                  Map<String,Object> headers)
Sets AsynchConstants.OBJECT_ID_HEADER and AsynchConstants.ENTITY_TYPE_HEADER headers if there are available corresponding values in message.

Parameters:
msg - the message
headers - the headers

checkFailedLimit

@Handler
public boolean checkFailedLimit(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                                        Message msg)
Returns true if failed count exceeds limit for failing.

Parameters:
msg - the message
Returns:
true when limit was exceeded, otherwise false

nextRoute

@Handler
public String nextRoute(@Header(value="processingMessage")
                                Message msg)
Gets URI of the next route. The URI is in the following format: "direct:SERVICE_operationNameAbstractBasicRoute.OUT_ROUTE_SUFFIX"

Parameters:
msg - the message
Returns:
URI of next route
